thread.title: Australian gothic: Bizarre tales of murder and the macabre
thread.title_full: Australian gothic: Bizarre tales of murder and the macabre

title: Australian gothic: Bizarre tales of murder and the macabre
text:
Broadcast: Monday 20 February 2017 11:05AM Image: Mabel Ambrose, victim of the Yarra Tragedy (Sir George Grey Special Collections, Auckland Libraries, AWNS-18990203-4-3) 
Imagine a world where baby killing is a form of welfare, household disinfectant and high-voltage electricity are used to induce abortions, severed heads are displayed in glass jars by the police. Welcome to Australian gothic. Gary Bryson became interested in such tales of murder and the macabre after an unexpected find in the basement of his house.
